(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (DT an) (JJ interesting) (NN series))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (NNS comments) (CD one))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (DT the) (JJ previous) (NNS posts)))
            (SBAR
              (WHADVP (WRB where))
              (S
                (NP (PRP one))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS readers)))))))))
    (, ,)))


expl(was-2, There-1)
root(ROOT-0, was-2)
det(series-5, an-3)
amod(series-5, interesting-4)
nsubj(was-2, series-5)
prep(series-5, of-6)
pobj(of-6, comments-7)
num(comments-7, one-8)
prep(comments-7, of-9)
det(posts-12, the-10)
amod(posts-12, previous-11)
pobj(of-9, posts-12)
advmod(one-14, where-13)
rcmod(comments-7, one-14)
dep(one-14, of-15)
det(readers-17, the-16)
pobj(of-15, readers-17)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP James) (NNP ,)))


nn(,-2, James-1)


(ROOT
  (SINV
    (VP (VBN made)
      (NP (DT the) (NN remark))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ my) (NN use))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (DT the) (NN word))))
          (VP (`` ``) (VBZ marvellicious) ('' '')))))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADVP (RB exactly)))
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN word))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP$ his) (NN daughter))
          (VP (VBZ uses)))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, made-1)
det(remark-3, the-2)
dobj(made-1, remark-3)
mark(marvellicious-11, that-4)
poss(use-6, my-5)
nsubj(marvellicious-11, use-6)
prep(use-6, of-7)
det(word-9, the-8)
pobj(of-7, word-9)
ccomp(made-1, marvellicious-11)
auxpass(made-1, was-13)
advmod(was-13, exactly-14)
det(word-17, the-15)
amod(word-17, same-16)
nsubjpass(made-1, word-17)
mark(uses-21, that-18)
poss(daughter-20, his-19)
nsubj(uses-21, daughter-20)
dep(word-17, uses-21)

  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Of)
      (NP (NN course)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Of-1)
pobj(Of-1, course-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNS marvellicious))
    (VP (VBZ is) (RB not)
      (NP
        (NP (DT an) (JJ official) (NN word))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (DT the) (NNP Oxford) (NNP Dictionary)))))
    (. .)))

neg(word-6, not-3)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADVP (RB merely))
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN combination))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (ADJP (`` ``) (JJ marvellous) ('' '')
              (CC and)
              (`` ``) (JJ delicious) ('' ''))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S (RB Then)
    (NP (PRP he))
    (VP (VBD went)
      (PRT (RP on))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB tell)
            (NP (PRP me))
            (PP (IN about)
              (NP (JJ other) (NNS words)))
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (PRP$ his) (NN daughter))
                (VP (VBZ uses)
                  (PP (IN like)
                    (NP
                      (NP (`` ``) (NNP Shiok) (DT a) (NN doo) (NN doo) ('' ''))
                      (CC and)
                      (NP (`` ``) (NNP Bombastic) ('' '')))))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(went-3, Then-1)
nsubj(went-3, he-2)
root(ROOT-0, went-3)
prt(went-3, on-4)
aux(tell-6, to-5)
xcomp(went-3, tell-6)
dobj(tell-6, me-7)
prep(tell-6, about-8)
amod(words-10, other-9)
pobj(about-8, words-10)
mark(uses-14, that-11)
poss(daughter-13, his-12)
nsubj(uses-14, daughter-13)
ccomp(tell-6, uses-14)
prep(uses-14, like-15)
nn(doo-20, Shiok-17)
det(doo-20, a-18)
nn(doo-20, doo-19)
pobj(like-15, doo-20)
cc(doo-20, and-22)
conj(doo-20, Bombastic-24)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD thought)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (MD would)
            (VP (VB be)
              (NP (NN fun))
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB find)
                    (PRT (RP out))
                    (SBARQ
                      (WHNP (WP what))
                      (SQ (VBZ is)
                        (NP
                          (NP (NN everyone) (POS 's))
                          (JJ favorite) (NN word)))))))
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB when))
                (S
                  (NP (PRP you))
                  (VP (VBP come)
                    (PP (IN across)
                      (NP
                        (NP (NN something))
                        (ADJP (RB really) (JJ tasty))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(thought-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, thought-2)
nsubj(fun-6, it-3)
aux(fun-6, would-4)
cop(fun-6, be-5)
ccomp(thought-2, fun-6)
aux(find-8, to-7)
xcomp(fun-6, find-8)
prt(find-8, out-9)
attr(is-11, what-10)
dep(find-8, is-11)
poss(word-15, everyone-12)
possessive(everyone-12, 's-13)
amod(word-15, favorite-14)
nsubj(is-11, word-15)
advmod(come-18, when-16)
nsubj(come-18, you-17)
advcl(fun-6, come-18)
prep(come-18, across-19)
pobj(across-19, something-20)
advmod(tasty-22, really-21)
amod(something-20, tasty-22)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP suspect)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S (`` ``)
            (NP (NNP Shiok))
            ('' '')
            (VP (MD might)
              (VP (VB be)
                (UCP
                  (NP (DT a) (JJ popular) (CD one))
                  (CC or)
                  (ADVP (RB perhaps)))))))))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a)
          (ADJP
            (ADJP (JJR better))
            (CC and)
            (ADJP (RBR more) (JJ imaginative)))
          (NN superlative))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP care)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB share)))))))))
    (. ?)))


nsubj(suspect-2, I-1)
dep(have-15, suspect-2)
mark(one-11, that-3)
nsubj(one-11, Shiok-5)
aux(one-11, might-7)
cop(one-11, be-8)
det(one-11, a-9)
amod(one-11, popular-10)
ccomp(suspect-2, one-11)
cc(one-11, or-12)
advmod(one-11, perhaps-13)
nsubj(have-15, you-14)
root(ROOT-0, have-15)
det(superlative-21, a-16)
amod(superlative-21, better-17)
cc(better-17, and-18)
advmod(imaginative-20, more-19)
conj(better-17, imaginative-20)
dobj(have-15, superlative-21)
nsubj(care-23, you-22)
rcmod(superlative-21, care-23)
aux(share-25, to-24)
xcomp(care-23, share-25)
